name: publish
chn: vt. 出版; vt. & vi. 发表 (作品)
example_en: She hopes to publish her first novel next year.
example_cn: 她希望明年能发表她的第一部小说。
word_family: publisher (n. 出版商), publication (n. 出版物), publishing (n. 出版业)
memory_tips: 词根 'publi-' 来自拉丁语 'publicus'，意为 '公共的'，后缀 '-ish' 表示动作。联想记忆：想象一个作家在公共场合（public）展示（-ish）他的作品。图像记忆：想象一本书从印刷机中出来，准备公开发行。

image_prompt.main_image: A stack of newly printed books on a table, with a publisher's logo visible on the spine, and a writer signing copies at a book launch event.
image_prompt.example_image: A young woman sitting at a desk, typing on her laptop with a stack of manuscript pages beside her, looking hopeful and determined.
